document_data.name: Queltar Thaeloon
document_data.mainbody: '''Queltar Thaeloon'''Â was the presumed Archmage Arcane of the [[Arcane Brotherhood]] in [[Luskan]] in the late 1360s. He might have been the one known as the '''Wizard of Green Fire''', a top lieutenant of another Archmage Arcane, [[Arklem Greeth]].
document_data.History:
By [[1366 DR]] and through to [[1370 DR]], Queltar Thaeloon was thought to hold the title of Archmage Arcane of the Hosttower. He resided on the upper levels of the central spire of the [[Hosttower of the Arcane]] in [[Luskan]].

Eventually, however, two senior mages named [[Eldeluc]] and [[Valkebar]] assassinated the Wizard of Green Fire, and on to ambush the Archmage Arcane Arklem Greeth on [[Eleint 14]] in the {{YearlinkName|1371}}.
